entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 8:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few rain showers or wet flurries changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
